id.description: Unique identifier of the user who performed the activity

type.description: Type of the user who performed the activity (e.g., admin, user)

ip.description: IP address from where the activity was performed

email.description: Email of the user who performed the activity

id.description: Unique identifier for the activity log entry

metadata.description: Additional data or information related to the activity

activity_type.description: The type or category of the activity

activity_description.description: A description of the activity that took place

created_at.description: The timestamp when the activity occurred
